abstract: European banks should suffer less than their American counterparts from the Obama administration’s proposed bank tax, Reuters Breakingviews says.
snippet: European banks should suffer less than their American counterparts from the Obama administration’s proposed bank tax, Reuters Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: European banks should suffer less than their American counterparts from the Obama administration’s proposed bank tax, Reuters Breakingviews says.

headline.main: Planned U.S. Tax Might Hurt Europe’s Banks Less
